longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry issued to
  nationals of Ireland (Rep.) must be valid on arrival. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of emergency passports issued to nationals of
  Ireland (Rep.).

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Additional Information:
- Visitors being 15 years of age or older must hold own travel
  document. 



 Czech Rep
